weekly_top_story.headline: COP30 in Belém delivers a politically charged climate finance boost and pledges for fossil fuel transition
weekly_top_story.summary: At the COP30 climate summit in Belém, Brazil, nations agreed on a comprehensive package to increase climate financing and accelerate the Paris Agreement's goals, though stopping short of a clear fossil fuel phase-out commitment, marking a critical milestone in global climate negotiations.

stories.headline: China extends visa-free stay for Australian citizens until end of 2025
stories.summary: China announced the extension of its visa-free arrangement for Australian visitors to 30 days through the end of 2025, a move likely to enhance travel and bilateral ties between the two countries amid evolving geopolitical dynamics.

stories.headline: UN highlights ongoing threat from landmines despite international treaties
stories.summary: UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres underscored the persistent hazard posed by landmines worldwide even as some signatories to the Ottawa Treaty renew their use, emphasizing a continued challenge for global humanitarian and security efforts.
